page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PUPIL
page.content: Around 6:30 each morning I get up and do a paper round After this I have breakfast and set off for school At 9:00 the bell goes for tutor 9:20 lessons start, I have Geography At 10:40 there is a break, lessons then start again.Lunch is after this then back to my tutor.Lifestudies is after another break & my last lesson begins English, school finishes at 3:55.When I get home tea is usually ready ,after tea I either do homework or go out with my mates.I get in around 9:00pm I watch televison and do any homework I did not do!I have super sugerpuffs & hot chocolate and after this I go to bed & read.Another day in my life is over.
